content: sole sts on the second needle 64 72 sts in total place the removable stitch marker to mark the new start of the round at the beginning of the instep stitches which are now on needle 1 knit or pattern every round until the foot is approx 4 5 cm shorter than the length you need remembering that if you are continuing a pattern it is on the instep sts only if using a pattern on the instep try to finish at the end of a row repeat or section of the pattern toe the toe sts are all knit to shape a standard square toe round 1 *k1 ssk knit to last 3 sts on the needle k2tog k1 *repeat for 2nd needle 4 sts decreased 60 68 rem round 2 knit all around repeat rounds 1 & 2 till 12 sts remain on each needle or 24 in total for either size sock then join using kitchener stitch/grafting weave in ends pattern by barbara fisher no copyright but please do not charge for its use nov 2018 questions worries want to show me what you ve done on ravelry missbarbara2 5 alternate round toe avoiding grafting 64 stitch sock round 1 *k6 ssk repeat from * 8 times 8 sts decreased = 56 sts rem rounds 2- 5 knit round 6 *k5 ssk repeat from * 8 times 48sts rem rounds 7-9 knit round 11 *k4 ssk repeat from * 8 times 40 sts rounds 12 and 13 knit round 14 *k3 ssk repeat from * 8 times 32 sts rounds 15 and 16 knit round 17 *k2 ssk repeat from * 8 times 24 sts round 18 knit round 19 *k1 ssk repeat from * 8 times 16 sts round 20 *ssk repeat *8 times 8 sts rem cut a 15cm tail and thread on a needle pull through the 8 sts remaining on the needle and fasten_off 72 stitch sock round 1 *k7 ssk repeat from * 8 times 8 sts decreased = 64 sts rem rounds 2- 5 knit round 6 *k6 ssk repeat from * 8 times 56sts rem rounds 7-9 knit round 10 *k5 ssk repeat from * 8 times 48sts rem rounds 11-13 knit round 14 *k4 ssk repeat from * 8 times 40 sts rounds 15 and 16 knit round 17 *k3 ssk repeat from * 8 times 32 sts rounds 18 knit round 19 *k2 ssk repeat from * 8 times 24 sts round 20 knit round 21 *k1 ssk repeat from * 8 times 16 sts round 22 *ssk repeat *8 times 8 sts rem cut a 15cm tail and thread on a needle pull through the 8 sts remaining on the needle and fasten_off 6
